word_mean: 〔复epidermides〕〔NA〕表皮：皮肤最外面的无血管层，由胚胎外胚层演化而来，厚度不一，0.07～0.12mm，足底分别可达0.8和1.4mm，细胞分化亦最明显，从内到外可分五层：基底层(stratum basale epidermidis)，由柱状细胞垂直排列组成
棘细胞层(stratum spinosum epidermidis)，由具短棘状突起的扁平多角细胞组成
颗粒层(stratum granulosum epidermidis)，由扁平颗粒细胞组成

sentence.Network_en: The external layer of skin is called the epidermis.
There is a neoplasm originating in his leg's epidermis.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的腿上有个生长在表皮上的肿瘤。

sentence.Network_en: The epidermis forms a continuous single layer of cells.
sentence.Network_cn: 真皮是一个连续的单一细胞层.

PerfectNetExp.abs: I 表皮层（epidermis）(Epidermis)表皮是皮肤的最外层，厚度约0.04mm，不含血管，其营养是靠基底层细胞供给。表皮的最外层是角质层，这一层 …
...利用人体必需的纯氧和水实施的剥皮术具有卓越的美容效果,可促进表皮,epidermis,再生,以及重塑真皮,dermis,胶原,collagen,和弹性蛋白,elastin,恢复肌肤弹性.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... lat= bring,out, 表示“拿出,带出”" ) epidermis n 表皮，外皮 （bene 好+.
...fea?hers) 主要是家禽及观赏乌类的羽毛，且与屋尘缆关系密切。因后者可潜藏在其中生长繁殖。 5．上皮(epidermis) 猫、狗、免等及家畜的上皮脱屑，唾液、尿等排泄物均具抗原件，且脱屑比毛的抗原性更强。近年来饲养宠物者.

shell 甲shell epidermis 壳表皮shell eye 壳眼

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: via late Latin from Greek, from epi 'upon' + derma 'skin'

entry.def: Your epidermis is the thin, protective, outer layer of your skin.

means.word_mean: 1. the outer layer of the skin covering the exterior body surface of vertebrates

auth_sentence.content: The underlying epidermis, called the mantle..., secretes the animals' shell.
auth_sentence.res_content: The underlying epidermis, called the mantle..., secretes the animals' shell.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The underlying epidermis, called the mantle..., secretes the animals' shell.

auth_sentence.content: But you can still get ridge detail from the underside of the epidermis.
auth_sentence.res_content: But you can still get ridge detail from the underside of the epidermis.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But you can still get ridge detail from the underside of the epidermis.

auth_sentence.content: For every ridge you have on the epidermis, you have two on the dermis - we call it a tramline effect.
auth_sentence.res_content: For every ridge you have on the epidermis, you have two on the dermis - we call it a tramline effect.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: For every ridge you have on the epidermis, you have two on the dermis - we call it a tramline effect.

stems_affixes.word_buile: derm皮肤+al……的→adj.皮肤的, 真皮的
hypo在……下面+derm皮肤→n.[植]下皮,[节肢动物的]真皮

sentences.en: The external layer of skin is called the epidermis.
